body:
Builds of of `hdf5@1.10.6`  on `linux-centos7-skylake_avx512` with `gcc@8.3.0` and on `linux-ubuntu16.04-broadwell` with `gcc@7.4.0`  fails with following `patch` error

```
==> Created stage in /tmp/yangw/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.10.6-wn3d32vilbvopkvr352yk5osjjjax4ng
1 out of 1 hunk FAILED -- saving rejects to file src/H5public.h.rej
==> Patch PATH_TO_SPACK/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/hdf5/h5public-skip-mpicxx.patch failed.
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'PATH_TO_SPACK/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-broadwell/gcc-7.4.0/patch-2.7.6-l7j5o3em3cznptfompr6djszvwly5mfk/bin/patch' '-s' '-p' '1' '-i' 'PATH_TO_SPACK/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/hdf5/h5public-skip-mpicxx.patch' '-d' '.'
```

The previous version `hdf5@1.10.5` builds with no problems.
title: Installation issue: hdf5@1.10.6 +mpi
